creator: mwisnicki@gmail.com
text:
Using <junit> with <batchtest> tries to execute non test classes which include abstract classes (bug 20547, from 2003!) and helper classes which will fail with "No runnable methods" which is possibly the same as bug 2956 (2001 WTF !?).

JUnit-4.11

creator: mclarke@apache.org
text: Resolved under revision revision 1523198 with the addition of a 'skipNonTests' attribute to the test and batchtest tasks.
